```{r}
gw15block <- read.csv("gw15_block_all.csv")
gw20block <- read.csv("gw20_block_all.csv")
gw22block <- read.csv("gw22_block_all.csv")
gw34block <- read.csv("gw34_block_all.csv")
```

```{r}
gw15block$gw <- "gw15"
gw20block$gw <- "gw20"
gw22block$gw <- "gw22"
gw34block$gw <- "gw34"
gw_combined <- rbind(gw15block, gw20block, gw22block, gw34block)
```

```{r}
gw_H3c <- gw_combined %>%
  group_by(gw, H3_annotation) %>%
  summarise(H3count = n())
```

```{r}
gw_H3c$H3_annotation <- factor(gw_H3c$H3_annotation, levels = c("EN-ET-SP-early1", "EN-ET-SP-early2", "EN-ET-SP-early3", "EN-ET-L6-early4", "EN-ET-SP-2", "EN-ET-SP-A", "EN-ET-L5-1", "EN-ET-L6-A", "EN-ET-SP-3", "EN-ET-SP-4", "EN-ET-L6-early3", "EN-ET-SP-P2", "EN-ET-SP-1", "EN-ET-SP-5", "EN-ET-L6-early5", "EN-ET-SP-P1", "EN-ET-L6-early2", "EN-ET-SP-early4", "EN-ET-SP-early5", "EN-ET-L6-early1", "EN-ET-L5/6", "EN-ET-L6-P", "EN-ET-SP-V1T1", "EN-ET-SP-V1T2", "EN-ET-L6-V1", "EN-IT-L3/4-1", "EN-IT-L2/3-A2", "EN-IT-L3-A", "EN-IT-L4/5-1", "EN-IT-L4/5-early", "EN-IT-L2/3-A1", "EN-IT-L6-2", "EN-IT-L4-A", "EN-IT-L5-1", "EN-IT-L5/6-P", "EN-IT-L4-late", "EN-IT-L6-1", "EN-IT-L4/5-late", "EN-IT-Hip", "EN-IT-L3-late", "EN-IT-L3/4-early", "EN-IT-L3/4-T", "EN-IT-L3/4-P2", "EN-IT-L4-1", "EN-IT-L3-V1", "EN-IT-L4-V1", "EN-IT-L3/4-P", "EN-IT-L6-late", "EN-IT-L3-P", "EN-IZ-2", "EN-IZ-3", "EN-oSVZ-1", "EN-IZ-1", "EN-L2-2", "En-oSVZ-2", "EN-L2-3", "EN-L2-1", "EN-L2-4"))
```

```{r}
stacked_barplot <- ggplot(gw_H3c, aes(fill=gw, y=H3count, x=H3_annotation)) + 
  geom_bar(position="stack", stat="identity") +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#B0F26D", "#5ebe5a", "#F066EA", "blueviolet")) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5),
        axis.title.y = element_blank(),
        plot.margin = unit(c(1, 1, 1, 5), "cm"),
        plot.title.position = "plot",
        plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.4),
        legend.position = "right"
        ) 
print(stacked_barplot)
```

```{r}
# Saving the plot
ggsave("Cell Number.pdf", stacked_barplot, width = 15, height = 3.8, units = "in")
```
